mapper.select: SELECT * FROM subjects WHERE user_id = #{userId} AND archived = FALSE ORDER BY updated_at DESC
SELECT * FROM subjects WHERE id = #{subjectId} AND user_id = #{userId}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO subjects (user_id, name, color_code, description, archived, created_at, updated_at) VALUES (#{subject.userId}, #{subject.name}, #{subject.colorCode}, #{subject.description}, FALSE, CURRENT_TIMESTAMP, CURRENT_TIMESTAMP)
mapper.update: UPDATE subjects SET name = #{subject.name}, color_code = #{subject.colorCode}, description = #{subject.description}, updated_at = CURRENT_TIMESTAMP WHERE id = #{subject.subjectId} AND user_id = #{subject.userId}
UPDATE subjects SET archived = TRUE, updated_at = CURRENT_TIMESTAMP WHERE id = #{subjectId} AND user_id = #{userId}
